name: Prison Escape game
description:
Prison Escape game

Get ready to attack maximum security prison on hilly landscape in Prison Escape City Jail Break 3D game.

It is a very exciting and thrilling police chase game. Use your stamina and try to successfully breakout from the culpable. Prove that your
area a Professional imprisonment and get yourself out from this criminal jail.

Some hardcore criminal and thugs are lockdown in special cells, get master key from warden so you can help escaping all.
Police Prisoners Transport Van is a police prison transport duty simulation that not only lets you drive a criminal transport police bus but also lets you feel the adrenaline of prison breaks and police chase.

key features:

- Smooth controls
- Extreme chase game
- Superb 3D graphics
- Amazing bus simulation experience
